data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

They say to always face forward. So while facing forward you can take either 6 steps forward or 4 steps forward. The first 2 steps are both taken forward. So in the second two steps you are facing away from the line of the person pointing you on their way back. So in the third and final step it is backward. So take 3 steps forward, take 4 steps forward and backward is backward. So in the fourth step the person is still facing forward but backward. So to return to the starting point you need to take both of those two steps forward. So in the fifth step you are still facing forward but backward. So in the sixth step you are still facing forward but backward. So in the seventh step you are still facing forward. So in the eighth step you are still facing away from the line of the person pointing you on their way back. So in the ninth step you are still facing away from the line of the person pointing you back. So in the tenth step you are still facing away from the line of the person pointing you back. Thus, the answer is Yes.
